title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 148.9 - Monitoring the program
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 148.9 - Monitoring the program

State Regulations

The Performance Evaluation Subcommittee of the NYS-CSEA Joint

Labor-Management Committee on the Work Environment and Productivity will
monitor the administration of the program in accordance with the State/CSEA
agreements. Complaints and allegations of arbitrary actions by persons involved
in the administration of the program may be brought to the attention of the
subcommittee by appropriate responsible union or management
representatives. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
148.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
